name: Trips n Salsa
overview:
Trips-N-Salsa is building an online marketplace for hotels and small businesses.

We’re on a mission to disrupt the B2B travel booking space and provide an experience where small businesses can find, negotiate, and book travel. For hotels, we provide a low-cost acquisition and distribution channel. With robust analytics and transparency, businesses and hotels can better manage and optimize their bookings.

We’re excited to launch our first product, RateXpress. RateXpress is a revolutionary tool saving hotels and businesses valuable time and money in negotiating and managing preferred rate contracts. Hotels can initiate contract negotiations, manage contracts at every stage of the process, and review booking revenue goals. Businesses will have one place to manage all of their preferred rate agreements.
